title: Visma-Lease a Bike And its Plot to Power Back to Team Pogačar: ‘It’s Clear We’ve Been Overtaken by UAE’
content:
Visma-Lease a Bike management refuses to blame crashes and sickness for 2024 downturn as it maps out masterplan for 2025.

Read the full article at Visma-Lease a Bike And its Plot to Power Back to Team Pogačar: ‘It’s Clear We’ve Been Overtaken by UAE’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
